name: Wine Mom
description:
The World's First Wine Mom Simulator by Clockwatcher

Navigate the trials and tribulations of having a wine mom in a narrative adventure that aims to evoke the familial black comedy of Noah Baumbach and Todd Solondz.

Chose how to interact with your wine mom in a rich dialogue tree - will you avoid conflict no matter what or drop some truth bombs? Explore your house to find out how your wine mom came to be - some things may change depending on what day it is. With perseverance, you may even be able to rehabilitate wine mom (probably not though).

CONTROLS

  • A/W/S/D or Arrow Keys to Move
  • In dialogue menus, press D or Right Arrow to select an option
  • Press S or Down Key to scroll through dialogue faster

If you enjoyed this project, please consider leaving a comment or making a small donation as a gesture, I'm dying here. Not literally, but like... spiritually.

Constructive criticism and bug reporting are also appreciated, even though they make my sensitive lil artist's soul cry. I mean not that you're gonna be encountering bugs, hahahaha, no siree, no bugs here. (srsly, you shouldn't).

Infinite love to goes to Adam Le Doux and my younger brother - you really are the smart one in the family.
